```{r}

#Librarys
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(match2C)
library(dplyr)
library(plyr)
year_of_birth = read.table("", header = T)
sex = read.table("", header = T)
date_of_attendings = read.table("", header = T)
ethnic = read.table("", header = T)
date_of_cancer_diag = read.table("", header = T)
type_of_cancer = read.table("", header = T)


ukb_datas_all_in_1=data.frame( eid=numeric(502366))
ukb_datas_all_in_1$eid = year_of_birth$eid
ukb_datas_all_in_1$birthyear = year_of_birth$value
ukb_datas_all_in_1$sex = sex$value[match(sex$eid, ukb_datas_all_in_1$eid)]
unique_ethnic<- list(eid= unique(ethnic$eid), Ethnic = I(split(ethnic$value, ethnic$eid)))
ukb_datas_all_in_1$ethnic = merge(ukb_datas_all_in_1, unique_ethnic, by = , all.x = T)











```
